transaction_reminder: 请用户注意，切勿听信他人指示操作，将资产转移到你无法控制的地址或钱包中，交易一旦发生就无法还原，资产将会转移出去。如果要进行加密货币资产变现(换成法币)，请咨询合法合规的交易所进行交易，避免与个人进行场外交易。
news_message: 自 2022/3/25，所有使用钱包进行 BTC/ETH 交易的客户将被抽取 0.1% 的手续费, 手续费将在提领时被抽取
aml_warning: 与CYBAVO AML Solution Provider's List进行比较后，这是一个可疑的数字货币地址。如果你与这个地址互动，你可能会遭遇以下风险。

(“CYBAVO”) products, services or software to platforms with decentralized applications (“DeFi Platforms”), you may be provided with certain services offered by a third party, including links to third-party websites or resources such as virtual currency information and related applications (collectively referred to as “third-party services''). You hereby acknowledge and agree to hold harmless and exempt CYBAVO from any claims, complaints, errors, liabilities, losses, omissions arising from your use of these DeFi Platforms and/or third-party services even and especially when access to these DeFi Platforms and/or third-party services is provided via any CYBAVO products, services or software.
